name: I Regressed, but the World didnt End
author: Son Byeong-jun &#40손병준&#41
content: Lee Do-hyeok returned to the past to save the world. He was told to prepare as much as possible.But… the world isn’t ending. Now all that’s left for Do-hyeok is a mountain of debt.&quotI’ll pay you a salary, so just help me with my game streaming!&quot... And so, he started game streaming. But for some reason, it’s way too easy?Watch a former hero’s debut as a game streamer!
